txt.en: Clearly, if one is to learn to properly manipulate the forces of nature and other lore, one must first understand the true nature of power.

Incarnate beings -- even the Elves -- were never truly meant to channel the primal energies from which the world is formed, and so it tears at them even as they strive to master it. As you have learned more about the nature of power you have learned to let these powers flow through you with less difficulty, though great care is still called for.
